subject: Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: From 1997 to 2002, horses trained by Bob Baffert won 8 of 17 Triple Crown races. But since then, Baffert has been blanked.
snippet: From 1997 to 2002, horses trained by Bob Baffert won 8 of 17 Triple Crown races. But since then, Baffert has been blanked.
